Class NotPermissionValidator

java.lang.Object
com.github.kaktushose.jda.commands.dispatching.validation.impl.NotPermissionValidator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Validator<Member,NotPerm>
public class NotPermissionValidator extends Object implements Validator<Member,NotPerm>
A Validator implementation that checks the NotPerm constraint.

  • Method Details

    • apply

      public void apply(Member member, NotPerm perm, Validator.Context context)
      Validates an argument. The argument must be a user or member that doesn't have the specified discord permission.
      Specified by:
      apply in interface Validator<Member,NotPerm>
      Parameters:
      member - the argument to validate
      perm - the corresponding annotation
      context - the corresponding InvocationContext
